flow.descriptionCdata:
107815e5-ebe6-4d28-a721-c6efa1f67c4b.064be7b1-7a2a-4d7c-b0d3-9df6cb906345.prompt=Resource Provider ID 107815e5-ebe6-4d28-a721-c6efa1f67c4b.08cd70d9-3335-47cf-be43-819c384f8f83.description=This workflow updates the Process Instance State using PEM API. Inputs\: _PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID - Process Instance Id _processInstanceState - Process Instance State (Use value from selection list CSA-ProcessInstance-State) Result\: _processInstanceState -Updated Process Instance State 107815e5-ebe6-4d28-a721-c6efa1f67c4b.178ca101-eac8-4d91-885d-e27569a35aa3.prompt=User Identifier 107815e5-ebe6-4d28-a721-c6efa1f67c4b.1e00da3a-1d49-418d-9861-51cafeb9357d.description=
Check the current date and time, and returns a java DateAndTime formatted string of it. If locale is specified, it will return the date and time string based on the locale.Otherwise, default locale will be used.

Inputs\:
    localeLang - The locale language for date and time string. 
Examples\:  en, ja, unix.
    localeCountry - The locale country for date and time string. For example, US or JP. If localeLang is not specified, this input will be ingored.

Result\:
    Current date and time.

Responses\:
    success - Date/time retrieved successfully.   
    failure - Date/time could not be retrieved.

Notes.
    1. If localeLang is 'unix' the localeCountry input is ignored and the result will be the current UNIX timestamp.
107815e5-ebe6-4d28-a721-c6efa1f67c4b.22b3fe7e-fdb3-45ad-a51e-3651e2cbae0a.prompt=User Identifier 107815e5-ebe6-4d28-a721-c6efa1f67c4b.3580ad39-3780-4aa1-8eed-207dd16f50ba.description=
Sends an smtp email
 
Input Parameters\:
hostname - hostname or ip address of smtp server
port - port smtp service is listening
from - from email address
to - email address(s) or recipients
subject - email subject
body - body of the email
htmlEmail - true or false, whether the email should be sent supporting html rich email.
readReceipt - true or false, whether or not to request a read receipt
attachments - comma separated list of files to attach (must be full path)
username - if SMTP authentication is needed, the username to send
password - the password to use
characterSet - the character set encoding for the entire email which includes subject, body, attached file name and the attached file. Default value is UTF-8
contentTransferEncoding - the content transfer encoding scheme (such as 7bit, 8bit, base64, quoted-printable etc) for the entire email which includes subject, body, attached file name and the attached file. Default value is - quoted-printable or Q Encoding.
 
 Responses\:
 success - successfully sent the email
 failure - failed to send the email

Note\:
For special characters (East Asian, right-to-left languages, etc.) you must install the support files on your local machine.
	For doing this on Windows go to Control Panel -> Regional and Language Options -> Language and check the options at Supplemental language support.
107815e5-ebe6-4d28-a721-c6efa1f67c4b.3682a972-602b-4194-87c0-67e45d2ccddc.description=
Sends an smtp email
 
Input Parameters\:
hostname - hostname or ip address of smtp server
port - port smtp service is listening
from - from email address
to - email address(s) or recipients
subject - email subject
body - body of the email
htmlEmail - true or false, whether the email should be sent supporting html rich email.
readReceipt - true or false, whether or not to request a read receipt
attachments - comma separated list of files to attach (must be full path)
username - if SMTP authentication is needed, the username to send
password - the password to use
characterSet - the character set encoding for the entire email which includes subject, body, attached file name and the attached file. Default value is UTF-8
contentTransferEncoding - the content transfer encoding scheme (such as 7bit, 8bit, base64, quoted-printable etc) for the entire email which includes subject, body, attached file name and the attached file. Default value is - quoted-printable or Q Encoding.
 
 Responses\:
 success - successfully sent the email
 failure - failed to send the email

Note\:
For special characters (East Asian, right-to-left languages, etc.) you must install the support files on your local machine.
	For doing this on Windows go to Control Panel -> Regional and Language Options -> Language and check the options at Supplemental language support.
107815e5-ebe6-4d28-a721-c6efa1f67c4b.39cdecad-31d8-4d0f-9da5-a6f8b792734b.prompt=User Identifier 107815e5-ebe6-4d28-a721-c6efa1f67c4b.627f645b-66da-44dd-b925-2d398481b6d7.prompt=Component ID 107815e5-ebe6-4d28-a721-c6efa1f67c4b.78fefbc5-6644-4c02-a4f0-d499e4e15b49.prompt=User Identifier 107815e5-ebe6-4d28-a721-c6efa1f67c4b.7fa3a20e-f4db-4eca-9757-6467cdc808e0.description=This workflow adds/ updates the component properties to Instance using Artifact APIs. onlyUpdate\: yes/no yes - To update values of existing properties no - To add and/or update properties keyValuePairs\: If you want to Add/update new properties\: property1 PUBLIC INTEGER 5 property2 PUBLIC STRING abc xyz If you want to only update the values of existing properties\: property1 5 property2 abc xyz 107815e5-ebe6-4d28-a721-c6efa1f67c4b.9e047c8c-47e1-44f4-a5c6-88771384ba08.prompt=Process Instance ID 107815e5-ebe6-4d28-a721-c6efa1f67c4b.9e87644c-e31e-40da-8918-e92e22b540e2.prompt=Artifact ID 107815e5-ebe6-4d28-a721-c6efa1f67c4b.a17b8224-ba60-4f84-8536-f65016591dbc.prompt=User Identifier 107815e5-ebe6-4d28-a721-c6efa1f67c4b.cd9545a8-55af-4ad3-83c8-515fd3fe0b7e.prompt=Process Instance ID 107815e5-ebe6-4d28-a721-c6efa1f67c4b.cebd663e-957d-4b2d-aca5-2976953542d4.description=This workflow returns the component properties and values using Artifact APIs. result\: propertyNameValuesList\: pipe separated list of property name and values ( where each property name and values would be ; seprated and multiple values would be , seprated) e.g. - property 1; value1,value2|property 2; value3|property 3; value3,value4|........ 107815e5-ebe6-4d28-a721-c6efa1f67c4b.d5563210-09b2-4c9b-be17-3614ba028a26.description=This workflow updates the Process Instance State using PEM API. Inputs\: _PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID - Process Instance Id _processInstanceState - Process Instance State (Use value from selection list CSA-ProcessInstance-State) Result\: _processInstanceState -Updated Process Instance State
flow.name: VPC - Order Snapshot

step.name: Send Mail to Support for Snapshot

staticBinding.value:
Please add MTC server ${server.name} to the snapshot datastore (if not already done) and take a snapshot.

When completed, please respond to the requestor notifying them.
Requestor Email: ${server.email}

Your request to take a snapshot of the below server has been received.



Hostname: ${server.name}
Public IP: ${server.publicIP}
CSA ID: ${SVC_SUBSCRIPTION_ID}

Please allow up to 3 business days for this task to be completed.



Regards,
The MTC Support Team
